Comment: I have a trade deficit with my local grocery store. I always buy from them, they never buy from me.  This doesn't mean I am getting cheated by them, it means I am rich enough to afford to buy from them. It means I get my money somewhere else.  We generate our money internally through a strong economy. That affords us the ability to run trade deficits with other countries - to literally be rich enough to go and buy from the world.  This isn't a problem that needs to be fixed. It's a representation of how rich we are.
